Description: Figure of Nefertum, made of bronze with wooden feet, wearing kilt, wig, beard and elaborate headdress, one arm at side, the other at breast and holding cobra sceptre, eyes inlaid with silver and gold, wedjat-eye symbols, also of silver and gold, on headdress and upper arms, the ones on the arms being inlaid, traces of gilding remain, with suspension loop at back of the headdress.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Raymond G B Sabatier
